summary: A true breton female support character with custom AI.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=4]To customize her looks use [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74713/?]Celestine Healer Customizer[/url][/size][/center][center][/center][line]
[color=#ffa07a][size=4][font=trebuchet ms,helvetica,sans-serif]About Mod[/font][/size][/color]

[center][youtube]ZEdi7mrDYBg[/youtube][/center]
[line]
[color=#ffa07a][size=4][font=trebuchet ms,helvetica,sans-serif]About Mod[/font][/size][/color]

[b]Race[/b] Breton

[b]Level[/b] AutoLevel 4-150

[b]Class[/b]
Mystic, Priest

[b]Flags[/b]
Essential, Marriageable

[b]Skills[/b]
Alteration, Conjuration, Illusion, Restoration, Sneak

[b]AI[/b]
- Does not initiate combat.
- Goes invisible and moves quietly when sneaking.
- Gives light to player in caves, ruins and on player's command.
- Converts ores automatically and on players command.
- Calms targets when player does not want to fight.
- Summons animals in combat.
- Fears targets around herself.
- Infuriates targets around her enemy.
- Debuffs and poisons her enemy.
- Buffs player and allies when combat begins and on player's command.
- Heals player and allies in combat.
- Removes all hostile effects from player after combat.
- Resurrects target under player's cross-hair on player's command.
- Allows player to breathe under water on player's command.
- Cooks food, crafts [s]potions[/s].

[u]See [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/articles/40915/]this[/url] article for detailed information on custom AI.[/u]

[b]Location[/b]
Whiterun - Temple Of Kynareth
[line]
[color=#ffa07a][size=4][font=trebuchet ms,helvetica,sans-serif]Installation[/font][/size][/color]

1. Download [i]Common Files[/i] from STEP-1 and extract it manually or activate it via manager.
2. Download one of the [i]Body Files[/i] from STEP-2 and extract it manually or activate it via manager.
3. Activate the Celestine.esp manually or via manager.
[line]
[color=#ffa07a][size=4][font=trebuchet ms,helvetica,sans-serif]Updating[/font][/size][/color]

1. Dismiss her from your followers in-game. If you are in a interior location then go outside. If you are in a exterior location then fast travel to somewhere else. Save your game. Quit the game.
3. Now download the updated files and overwrite with the existing files. Go in the game and check if its working properly.
[line]
[color=#ffa07a][size=4][font=trebuchet ms,helvetica,sans-serif]Uninstallation[/font][/size][/color]

1. Disable "Enable Custom AI" from Mod Configuration Menu then close the menu OR type "stopquest tpCelestineAIQuest" in console.
2. Dismiss her from your followers in-game. If you are in a interior location then go outside. If you are in a exterior location then fast travel to somewhere else. Save your game. Quit the game.
3. Deactivate the [i]Celestine Common Files[/i] and [i]Celestine Body Files[/i] then delete them.
[line]
[color=#ffa07a][size=4][font=trebuchet ms,helvetica,sans-serif]Recommended[/font][/size][/color]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15508/?]Better Fast Travel - Carriages and Ships - Overhauled[/url]
[url=http://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=352382488]Amazing Race Tweaks[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52019/?]Follower Commentary Overhaul - FCO[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13798/?]Follower Map Markers[/url]
[line]
[color=#ffa07a][size=4][font=trebuchet ms,helvetica,sans-serif]Mods Used For Screenshots[/font][/size][/color]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457]FaceLight[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17802]Climates Of Tamriel[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30450]Realistic Lighting Overhaul[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30936]RealVision ENB[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37764]Circlet Replacers for Women[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61013/?]Emfy Cleric Robes[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17727/?]Osare GothicLolita[/url]
Pinup Poser S
[line]
[color=#ffa07a][size=4][font=trebuchet ms,helvetica,sans-serif]My Mods[/font][/size][/color]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2632143/?tb=mods&pUp=1#]Venetia Serana
Celestine Healer Custom AI
Auto Recharge Weapons
Auto Consume Potions
Crowd Control Extended
TPFollowers[/url]
author: techprince

files.name: 12 Celestine ADEC
files.changelogHtml:
- Added more UNP based meshes.
- Repackaged into NMM friendly format.

files.name: 13 Celestine DreamGirl

files.name: 10 Celestine CBBE CHSBHC

+ Added CBBE Slim and CBBE Slim TBBP HDT meshes.
! Updated CBBE Curvy and CBBE Curvy TBBP HDT meshes.

files.name: 00 Celestine Common Files
files.changelogHtml:
! Fixed (hopefully) stuck issues while continuously healing with the same spell.
! Fixed auto teleportation while on a mount.
! Fixed Lesser Dragonhide spell giving double and permanent armor boost.
! Fixed poison spells not dispelling when target dies. They do 1%/2%/3% max health damage NOT 3%/4%/5% it was a description error.
